bike.description: Fuji A6-SL custom-butted alloy, integrated 1 1/2" lower head tube, oversized 34.9mm seat tube & PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: XS/S (46cm), S (49cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), L/XL (61cm)

components.description: Fuji A6-SL alloy chainstays, forged-road dropout w/ replaceable derailleur hanger
FC-770 carbon fork blades, w/ tapered alloy steerer
Shimano Sora STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 18-speed
Oval 327 aero alloy clincher, 20/24H precision road hubs, stainless bladed spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick, 60 tpi, 700c x 23mm, folding
Tektro R540 forged-alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
